structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.history: Repealed 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 1 -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 60, secs. 1(16) and (17).

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: District to maintain improvements -- Assessments -- Collection -- Lien.
